# isGroupRowStyle

**Instance Property**

Specifies whether this row view is a group row.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isGroupRowStyle: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] this row is a group row and will draw appropriately.

## Row Grouping

- **numberOfColumns**: Returns the number of columns represented by views in the table row view.

items.description: Returns the number of columns represented by views in the table row view.
